titleInfo.title: The Sāṃkhyā-Kārikā. Īśvara Kṛṣṇa's Memorable Verses on Sāṃkhya Philosophy with the Commentary of Gauḍapādācārya. Critically Edited with Introduction, Translation and Notes (Śrīmadīśvarakṛṣṇapraṇītāḥ sagauḍapādabhāṣyāḥ Sāṃkhyakārikāḥ vistṛtopodghātapāṭhāntaraṭippāṇyādibhiḥ samalaṅkṛtāḥ)
